content.raw:
When launching gazebo I get the following error:

Error [SDF.cc:788] Missing element description for [spherical_coordinates]
gazebo: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:418: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = sdf::Element]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

This happened after updating to the latest build on the default branch.
content.html:
When launching gazebo I get the following error:

Error [SDF.cc:788] Missing element description for [spherical_coordinates] gazebo: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:418: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = sdf::Element]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

This happened after updating to the latest build on the default branch.
